title: Textile, mid 19th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed on plain weave
description: A) Ground molotte printed in grey in zig-zag and meandering ivy pattern; over-printed with detached flower clusters in pink, blue, yellow and green. B) Similar ground, smaller vine; over-printed with large floral sprays and detached rosebuds in reds, pinks, yellow, blue and greens.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, mid 19th century.Medium: cotton
Technique: printed on plain weave. 1967-10-18-a.
